def_en: If you say that someone manipulates people, you disapprove of them because they skilfully force or persuade people to do what they want.

def_cn: 摆布，操纵，处理(事件或局势)
def_en: If you say that someone manipulates an event or situation, you disapprove of them because they use or control it for their own benefit, or cause it to develop in the way they want.
If you manipulate something that requires skill, such as a complicated piece of equipment or a difficult idea, you operate it or process it.

def_cn: 使脱臼复位;用推拿术治疗
def_en: If someone manipulates your bones or muscles, they skilfully move and press them with their hands in order to push the bones into their correct position or make the muscles less stiff.
